Name: VanRullen-Reddy-DeepFaceReconstruction Dataset
ReferencesAndLinks: VanRullen, R., & Reddy, L. (2018). Reconstructing Faces from fMRI Patterns using Deep Generative Neural Networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:1810.03856.
